00021 using Gtk;
00022 using System;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00026 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00027 
00028 namespace NyFolder.GUI {
00030     public class Window : Gtk.Window {
00031         // ============================================
00032         // PUBLIC Events
00033         // ============================================
00034         public BlankEventHandler Logout = null;
00035         public BlankEventHandler Quit = null;
00036 
00037         // ============================================
00038         // PROTECTED Members
00039         // ============================================
00040         protected NotebookViewer notebookViewer;
00041         protected Gtk.Statusbar statusBar;
00042         protected MenuManager menuManager;
00043         protected UserPanel userPanel;
00044         
00045         // ============================================
00046         // PRIVATE Members
00047         // ============================================
00048         private Gtk.VBox vboxRight;
00049         private Gtk.VBox vboxLeft;
00050         private Gtk.VBox vboxMain;
00051         private Gtk.HBox hboxMenu;
00052         private Gtk.HBox hbox;
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC Constructors
00056         // ============================================
00058         public Window() : base(Info.Name + " " + Info.Version) {
00059             // Initialize Window
00060             this.SetDefaultSize(620, 320);
00061             DefaultIcon = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("NyFolderIcon");
00062             this.DeleteEvent += new DeleteEventHandler(OnWindowDelete);
00063 
00064             // Initialize VBox
00065             this.vboxMain = new Gtk.VBox(false, 2);
00066             this.Add(this.vboxMain);
00067 
00068             // Initialize Menu Manager
00069             this.menuManager = new MenuManager();
00070             this.menuManager.Activated += new EventHandler(OnMenuActivated);
00071             this.AddAccelGroup(this.menuManager.AccelGroup);
00072 
00073             // Initialize HBox Menu
00074             this.hboxMenu = new Gtk.HBox(false, 0);
00075             this.vboxMain.PackStart(hboxMenu, false, false, 0);
00076 
00077             // Initialize MenuBar
00078             Gtk.MenuBar menuBar = this.MenuBar;
00079             this.hboxMenu.PackStart(menuBar, false, false, 0);
00080 
00081             // Initialize HBox
00082             this.hbox = new Gtk.HBox();
00083             this.vboxMain.PackStart(this.hbox, true, true, 2);
00084 
00085             // Initialize Left VBox
00086             this.vboxLeft = new Gtk.VBox(false, 2);
00087             this.hbox.PackStart(this.vboxLeft, false, false, 2);
00088 
00089             // Initialize User Panel
00090             this.userPanel = new UserPanel();
00091             this.vboxLeft.PackStart(this.userPanel, false, false, 2);
00092 
00093             // Initialize Right VBox
00094             this.vboxRight = new Gtk.VBox(false, 2);
00095             this.hbox.PackStart(this.vboxRight, true, true, 2);
00096 
00097             // Initialize ToolBar
00098             Gtk.Toolbar toolBar = this.ToolBar;
00099             toolBar.ShowArrow = true;
00100             toolBar.ToolbarStyle = ToolbarStyle.Both;
00101             this.vboxRight.PackStart(toolBar, false, false, 2);
00102 
00103             // Initialize Notebook Viewer
00104             this.notebookViewer = new NotebookViewer();
00105             this.vboxRight.PackStart(this.notebookViewer, true, true, 2);
00106 
00107             // Initialize Status Bar
00108             this.statusBar = new Gtk.Statusbar();
00109             this.vboxMain.PackEnd(this.statusBar, false, false, 0);
00110 
00111             // Window Show All
00112             this.ShowAll();
00113         }
00114 
00115         // ============================================
00116         // PRIVATE Methods
00117         // ============================================
00118 
00119 
00120         // ============================================
00121         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handler
00122         // ============================================
00123         private void OnWindowDelete (object sender, DeleteEventArgs args) {
00124             Application.Quit();
00125             args.RetVal = true;
00126         }
00127 
00128         private void OnMenuActivated (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00129             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00130                 Action action = sender as Action;
00131                 switch (action.Name) {
00132                     // File Menu
00133                     case "ProxySettings":
00134                         Glue.Dialogs.ProxySettings();
00135                         break;
00136                     case "Logout":
00137                         if (Base.Dialogs.QuestionDialog("Logout", 
00138                             "Do You Really Want To Logout ?")) 
00139                         {
00140                             if (Logout != null) Logout(this);
00141                         }
00142                         break;
00143                     case "Quit":
00144                         if (Quit != null) Quit(this);
00145                         Gtk.Application.Quit(); 
00146                         break;
00147                     // View Menu
00148                     case "ViewToolBar":
00149                         this.ToolBar.Visible = !this.ToolBar.Visible;
00150                         break;
00151                     case "ViewUserPanel":
00152                         this.UserPanel.Visible = !this.UserPanel.Visible;
00153                         break;
00154                     // Help Menu
00155                     case "About":
00156                         new Dialogs.About();
00157                         break;
00158                 }
00159             });
00160         }
00161 
00162         // ============================================
00163         // PUBLIC Properties
00164         // ============================================
00166         public Gtk.HBox MenuBarHBox {
00167             get { return(this.hboxMenu); }
00168         }
00169 
00171         public MenuManager Menu {
00172             get { return(this.menuManager); }
00173         }
00174 
00176         public Gtk.MenuBar MenuBar {
00177             get { return((Gtk.MenuBar) this.menuManager.GetWidget("/MenuBar")); }
00178         }
00179 
00181         public Gtk.Toolbar ToolBar {
00182             get { return((Gtk.Toolbar) menuManager.GetWidget("/ToolBar")); }
00183         }
00184 
00186         public UserPanel UserPanel {
00187             get { return(this.userPanel); }
00188         }
00189 
00191         public NotebookViewer NotebookViewer {
00192             get { return(this.notebookViewer); }
00193         }
00194 
00196         public Gtk.Statusbar StatusBar {
00197             get { return(this.statusBar); }
00198         }
00199     }
00200 }
